Package edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller

Class ShipmentsController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller.ShipmentsController
@Controller public class ShipmentsController extends Object
Handles the Thymeleaf controls for the pages dealing with shipments.
Since:
2/8/2022, 1/1/2023
Author:
Ian Black imb1007@sru.edu, Fady Aziz faa1002@sru.edu, Thomas Haley tjh1019@sru.edu

    • deleteShipment

      @GetMapping("/deleteshipment/{id}") public String deleteShipment(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds a frozen shipment that Master wants to delete. Using the id parameter and if found, redirects to delete confirmation page
      Parameters:
      id - of the shipment being deleted
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - stores the current logged in users HTTP session. Attribute "redirectLocation" can store a string containing the last page the user visited.
      Returns:
      redirects to /delete/deleteshipmentconfirm"

    • deleteShipmentConfirmation

      @GetMapping("/deleteshipmentconfirmation/{id}") public String deleteShipmentConfirmation(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds a shipment using the id parameter and if found, deletes the shipment and redirects to previous page.
      Parameters:
      id - of the shipment being deleted
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - stores the current logged in users HTTP session. Attribute "redirectLocation" can store a string containing the last page the user visited.
      Returns:
      redirectLocation

    • viewCarrierShipments

      @GetMapping("/viewshipment/{id}") public String viewCarrierShipments(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds a carrier using the id parameter and if found, adds all of the shipments of that carrier to the shipments page
      Parameters:
      id - of the shipment being viewed
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /viewfullshipment

    • viewShipmentBids

      @GetMapping("/viewshipmentbids/{id}") public String viewShipmentBids(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds a shipment using the id parameter and if found, adds all of the bids of that shipment to the bids page
      Parameters:
      id - of the shipment being used to get the bids
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - stores the current logged in users HTTP session. Attribute "redirectLocation" can store a string containing the last page the user visited.
      Returns:
      /bids or /viewbidscomplete

    • freezeShipment

      @GetMapping("/freezeshipment/{id}") public String freezeShipment(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds a shipment by ID then redirects to the Freeze Shipment confirmation page
      Parameters:
      id - of the shipment being frozen
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - stores the current logged in users HTTP session. Attribute "redirectLocation" can store a string containing the last page the user visited.
      Returns:
      /freeze/freezeshipmentconfirm

    • freezeShipmentConfirmation

      @GetMapping("/freezeshipmentconfirmation/{id}") public String freezeShipmentConfirmation(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds a shipment by ID then sets that shipments freight terms to FROZEN, disabling interaction with it for all users except master.
      Parameters:
      id - of the shipment being frozen
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      redirects to /createdshipments or redirects to /acceptedshipments or redirects to /pendingshipments

    • unfreezeShipment

      @GetMapping("/unfreezeshipment/{id}") public String unfreezeShipment(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds a shipment by ID, then Redirects to the Unfreeze Shipment confirmation page
      Parameters:
      id - of the shipment being frozen
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /freeze/unfreezeshipmentconfirm

    • unfreezeShipmentConfirmation

      @GetMapping("/unfreezeshipmentconfirmation/{id}") public String unfreezeShipmentConfirmation(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds a shipment by ID, then sets that shipments freight terms to AVAILABLE SHIPMENT, effectively unfreezing it.
      Parameters:
      id - of the shipment being frozen
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      redirects to /frozenshipments

      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session

    • selectCarrier

      @PostMapping("/selectcarrier") public String selectCarrier(@RequestParam("selectedCarrierId") Long selectedCarrierId, @RequestParam("inputPrice") String inputPrice, @RequestParam("shipmentId") Long shipmentId, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Handles the assignment of a shipment to a carrier
      Parameters:
      selectedCarrierId - id of the carrier selected
      inputPrice - price of the paid amount
      shipmentId - id of the shipment being assigned
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      redirectLocation

      Finds the shipment in the repository and changes its freight terms to "PENDING", keeping it in auction
      Parameters:
      id - of the shipment being denied
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model

      Returns:

    • updateShipment

      @PostMapping("/updateshipment/{id}") public String updateShipment(@PathVariable("id") long id, Shipments shipment, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Receives and passes the new shipment object off to be validated Once validated the object is saved to the shipments repository
      Parameters:
      id - of the shipment being edited
      shipment - holds new shipment object submitted by the user
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      redirects to /shipments or /edit/edit-shipments

      @PostMapping("submit-add-shipment") public String shipmentOrderForm(@ModelAttribute("shipments") Shipments shipment, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Receives a shipment object by the user and passes it off for validation Once valid it is saved to the shipment repository
      Parameters:

      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
